title: La Bohème
description: A passionate, timeless, and indelible story of love among young artists in Paris, has a special place in the repertoire because of its ability to communicate directly to audiences and move them to tears.

reviews.quote: Innovative staging that brings new life to this classic opera.
reviews.author: New York Times

reviews.quote: Madison's vision for La Bohème is both respectful of tradition and refreshingly modern.
reviews.author: Opera Today

title: Don Giovanni
description: Mozart's masterpiece combines comedy, tragedy, and supernatural elements in a powerful exploration of morality and desire.

reviews.quote: A bold, contemporary take on Mozart's complex masterpiece.
reviews.author: Chicago Tribune

reviews.quote: The production skillfully balances the opera's comedic and dramatic elements.
reviews.author: Opera Wire

title: Carmen
description: Bizet's passionate tale of the free-spirited Carmen has captivated audiences since its premiere with its sensuality and unforgettable music.

reviews.quote: Madison's Carmen is a revelation - passionate, dangerous, and utterly compelling.
reviews.author: San Francisco Chronicle

reviews.quote: This production brings new depth to Bizet's characters and highlights the opera's feminist undertones.
reviews.author: Classical Voice
